text: Kusukela kulokho izinhliziyo zenu zaba lukhuni zaba njengamadwala futhi zaba ngaphezu kwalokho kepha kwamanye amadwala kwaqhuma imifula futhi amanye awo ahlukana futhi kwaphuma amanzi amanye awo awa phansi ngenxa yokwesaba uMvelinqangi, akusikhona ukuthi uMvelinqangi akakunakile lokho enikwenzayo
